flowtrend 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Define the "blocked" time folds for cross-validation. This means that contiguous of times will be used to define CV folds.

make_cv_folds_in_blocks.Rd

The first fold will be ( 1 2 3 16 17 18 31 32 33 46 47 48 61 62 63 76 77 78 91 92 93), the second fold will be (4 5 6 19 20 21 34 35 36 49 50 51 64 65 66 79 80 81 94 95 96), and so forth.

Usage

make_cv_folds_in_blocks(ylist = NULL, nfold, TT = NULL, blocksize)

Arguments

nfold

Number of folds.

blocksize

Size of block (e.g. 3 will produce the example above).

Value

List of fold indices.

On this page
